body: @ducket I think she meant that she infused him with a fair amount of demonic essence so that he wouldn't wind up dieing like her previous husband, cause remember during the BJ she said he was no longer human after he noticed the heat
In Final page she said 'Rebuilding your entire body '  does it mean he is her previous husband?
He's not the translator we deserve, but what we need right now
Darknight... thank you for the translation
We all need some sexy demon girls in our lives... also "That out of control ass" Best quote in months. ^_^
